00016 class VerseIsObtainedWithNoContext : public IWhen
00017 {
00018 public:
00019     VerseIsObtainedWithNoContext() {}
00020 
00021     VerseIsObtainedWithNoContext(int verse_id) : m_verse_id(verse_id) {}
00022 
00023     void occurs(const World& world)
00024     {
00025         boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation = world.GetGiven<TestTranslation>()->get_translation();        
00026         m_verses = translation->get_verse(m_verse_id, 0);
00027     }
00028 
00029     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> > get_verses() const
00030     {
00031         return m_verses;
00032     }
00033 
00034 private:
00035     int m_verse_id;
00036     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> > m_verses;
00037 };

00045 
00046     void occurs(const World& world)
00047     {
00048         boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation = world.GetGiven<TestTranslation>()->get_translation();        
00049         m_verses = translation->get_verse(m_verse_id, 1);
00050     }

00062 class VerseIsCorrectWithNoContext : public IThen
00063 {
00064 public:
00065     VerseIsCorrectWithNoContext(int verse_id) : m_verse_id(verse_id) {}
00066 
00067     void ensure_that(const World& world)
00068     {
00069         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL(1, static_cast<int>(world.GetWhen<VerseIsObtainedWithNoContext>()->get_verses().size()));
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL(m_verse_id, world.GetWhen<VerseIsObtainedWithNoContext>()->get_verses()[0]->get_unique_id());
00071     }
00072 
00073 private:
00074     int m_verse_id;
00075 };
00076 
00077 class VerseIsCorrectWithNoContextWithContext : public IThen
00078 {
00079 public:
00080     VerseIsCorrectWithNoContextWithContext() {}
00081     VerseIsCorrectWithNoContextWithContext(int verse_id) : m_verse_id(verse_id) {}
00082 
00083     void ensure_that(const World& world)
00084     {
00085         int expected_number_verses = 0;
00086         int expected_first_verse_id = 0;
00087         int expected_last_verse_id = 0;
00088 
00089         if (m_verse_id == 0)
00090         {
00091             expected_number_verses = 2;
00092             expected_first_verse_id = 0;
00093             expected_last_verse_id = 1;
00094         }
00095         else if (m_verse_id == 2740)
00096         {
00097             expected_number_verses = 2;
00098             expected_first_verse_id = 2739;
00099             expected_last_verse_id = 2740;
00100         }
00101         else
00102         {
00103             expected_number_verses = 3;
00104             expected_first_verse_id = m_verse_id - 1;
00105             expected_last_verse_id = m_verse_id + 1;
00106         }
00107 
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL(expected_number_verses, static_cast<int>(world.GetWhen<VerseIsObtainedWithContext>()->get_verses().size()));
00109         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL(expected_first_verse_id, world.GetWhen<VerseIsObtainedWithContext>()->get_verses()[0]->get_unique_id());
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL(expected_last_verse_id, world.GetWhen<VerseIsObtainedWithContext>()->get_verses()[expected_number_verses-1]->get_unique_id());
00111     }
00112 
00113 private:
00114     int m_verse_id;
00115 };

00117 class TranslationFirstAndLastVerseBehavior : public CppUnit::TestFixture
00118 {
00119     CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE(TranslationFirstAndLastVerseBehavior);
00120     CPPUNIT_TEST(shouldGetSingleFirstVerseCorrectly);
00121     CPPUNIT_TEST(shouldGetSingleMiddleVerseCorrectly);
00122     CPPUNIT_TEST(shouldGetSingleSecondToLastVerseCorrectly);
00123     CPPUNIT_TEST(shouldGetSingleLastVerseCorrectly);
00124     CPPUNIT_TEST(shouldGetFirstVerseWithContextCorrectly);
00125     CPPUNIT_TEST(shouldGetMiddleVerseWithContextCorrectly);
00126     CPPUNIT_TEST(shouldGetLastVerseWithContextCorrectly);
00127     CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();
00128 
00129 public:
00130     void shouldGetSingleFirstVerseCorrectly()
00131     {
00132         World world(get_world_with_test_translation_given());
00133 
00134         world.When<VerseIsObtainedWithNoContext, int>(0);
00135         world.Then<VerseIsCorrectWithNoContext>(0);
00136     }
